name: `ipsw` Symbolicate Plugin
description: Imports `ipsw` symbols.json files into Project creating functions (if they don't exist) and adding symbols.
longdescription: This plugin accompanies the [symbolicator](https://github.com/blacktop/symbolicator) repo and takes the `symbols.json` output of running `ipsw kernel symbolicate` and applies it to a kernelcache in Binary Ninja creating functions if they don't exist.
